text: Kurkjian or Kurkdjian (Armenian: Քուրքջյան) is an Armenian surname that may refer to *Francis Kurkdjian (born 1969), Armenian perfumer and businessman *Ohannes Kurkdjian (1851–1903), Armenian photographer *Stephen Kurkjian, American journalist *Tim Kurkjian (born 1956), American Major League Baseball analyst, cousin of Stephen *Vahan Kurkjian (1863–1961), Armenian author, historian, teacher, and community leader Category:Armenian-language surnames
title: Kurkjian
